timeline.bodyText: In all assert method, the first argument is the "expected" value while the second one is the "actual" value. Can you swap them in this file to match that definition?
timeline.author: mimaison

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we don't need to print the stack trace if we can ignore it
timeline.author: mimaison

timeline.bodyText: Do we need daemonThread2 in this test?

replies.bodyText: I wanted to check if 2 daemonThreads are appropriately numbered.
replies.author: cryptoe

timeline.bodyText: Can we import static like assertEquals?

timeline.bodyText: I believe you can use the Java 8 syntax: Runnable runnable = () -> {};. This also appears in another file
